creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: wide mouth jar with flared lip; bubbled, cracked white glaze over most of body with brown glaze on body near base; four wide vertical grooves on each side of jar give it a squared appearance, but mouth and base are round
markings: maker\'s mark impression on base: HV
medium: Stoneware, wood-fired, white and brown glaze
title: Squared jar
